steps.name: Open sector selection for the 1 field
Open sector selection for the 2 field
Verify that the user is logged in

Enter description of yourself : Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. Check the rlbIbJG FJSrmHf's invitation card in the outgoing section
Verify that the name is rlbIbJG FJSrmHf
